name: Asia Aeronautical Training Academy (AATA)
about: Asia Aeronautical Training Academy (AATA), established in 2019, is a premier flying school in Johor, Malaysia, dedicated to training world-class pilots. AATA offers state-of-the-art training facilities and certified curriculums, ensuring cadets train on brand-new aircraft to maintain a high safety and reliability margin. The academy is the only institution in Malaysia conducting the widely-recognised Airline Preparation Programme, which facilitates the transition from piston-engine to jet aircraft. AATA provides various courses, including Private Pilot Licence, Assistant Flight Instructor, and Multi-Crew Pilot License, as well as a Bachelor of Aeronautical Engineering Technology in Professional Piloting. The academy also assists students in securing financial aid and educational loans. With a commitment to excellence and continuous improvement, AATA is a leading choice for aspiring pilots.
services:
["CPL/IR WITH FROZEN ATPL +
AIRLINE PREPARATION PROGRAMME
PRIVATE PILOT LICENCE
ASSISTANT FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR COURSE
ABRIDGE PROGRAMME
CPL LICENSE RENEWAL
MULTI-CREW PILOT LICENSE
BACHELOR OF AERONAUTICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY (PROFESSIONAL PILOTING)"]
